text: The operator of a venue as defined by paragraph (2) of subdivision b of ยง 10-701 of this subchapter may prominently display at the entrance to such venue, a sign stating in conspicuous letters that are at least three-fourths of an inch high that the unauthorized operation of a recording device at such place of public performance is prohibited by law and is punishable by criminal and civil penalties.

chapter.text: UNAUTHORIZED RECORDING IN A PLACE OF PUBLIC PERFORMANCE
